entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM EST Thursday 13 December 2018

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning early this morning and ending early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Fog dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 14 December 2018

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 14 December 2018
